about_the_game:
Animations Collection: Cursed Kingdoms is a special pack inspired by the "Cursed Kingdoms" collaborative effort between several artists and asset creators.
These animations were designed to complement the abyssal/creature aesthetics of the other assets in the Cursed Kingdoms lineup. The animations are also readily usable on their own and perfect for any project that needs a touch of horror or something sinister.

At a staggering 32 unique animations, this is the largest Animation Collection yet, and a terrific collection for designers not afraid to take their players on a journey into the abyss.

Features:

* 10 physical attack animations
* 18 skill animations
* 4 full-screen skill animations
* 60 FPS and 30 FPS versions of each animation, for a total of 64 animation sheets
* Includes Demo Project (RPG Maker MV only) for easy copy/paste implementation into your project right out of the box
* For use in RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice

Features:

short_description: Animations Collection: Cursed Kingdoms contains otherworldly-horror-inspired animations that are readily usable on their own for any projects that need a little bit of something sinister, as well as being perfect complements to the rest of the Cursed Kingdoms series of assets.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
